alert.note: Alert for Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 8:17PM CDT until July 30 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Miami County in east central Kansas... Linn County in east central Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Williamsburg to near Princeton to near Wellsville, moving south at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paola, Osawatomie, La Cygne, Mound City, Linn Valley, Parker, Blue Mound, Fontana and Beagle. This includes Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 200 and 201. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
